participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Lucas enjoys exploring new coffee blends and diving deep into the lore of Star Wars. He has a competitive spirit from his football days and often expresses himself through poetry.
participant_1.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Social and outgoing, Jordan thrives on interaction and enjoys the gym as a place to connect with others. He is passionate about cars and values his independence, often focusing on his own personal goals.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

content.text: dude, lets go to the gym man
